mapper.sql: a.vid AS "vid", a.v_name AS "vName", a.v_code AS "vCode", a.v_desc AS "vDesc", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.pid AS "pid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN auto_product b ON b.pid = a.pid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_version( v_name, v_code, v_desc, begin_date, end_date, pid, create_by, create_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{vName}, #{vCode}, #{vDesc}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{pid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_version SET v_name = #{vName}, v_code = #{vCode}, v_desc = #{vDesc}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, pid = #{pid}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE vid = #{id}
